code: import{CHANGE_SONGS_OF_ARTIST,CHANGE_ARTIST,CHANGE_ENTER_LOADING}from'./constants';import{fromJS}from'immutable';import{getSingerInfoRequest}from'../../../api/request';var changeArtist=function changeArtist(data){return{type:CHANGE_ARTIST,data:fromJS(data)};};var changeSongs=function changeSongs(data){return{type:CHANGE_SONGS_OF_ARTIST,data:fromJS(data)};};export var changeEnterLoading=function changeEnterLoading(data){return{type:CHANGE_ENTER_LOADING,data:data};};export var getSingerInfo=function getSingerInfo(id){return function(dispatch){getSingerInfoRequest(id).then(function(data){dispatch(changeArtist(data.artist));dispatch(changeSongs(data.hotSongs));dispatch(changeEnterLoading(false));});};};
